content: I want to create a site where users can register and store personal data. But for privacy reasons and GDPR compliance, etc., I don't want anyone to be able to access anyone else's data, including User 1. Is this possible?
I guess encryption would have to be involved, since as the webmaster I have full access to the database and can therefore bypass any access controls Backdrop might setup...?
It should be possible, but only by using custom access callbacks set with hook_menu_alter().
